title: Subpart 712-2 - Standards For General Hospital Construction Projects Approved Or Completed On Or After October 14, 1998
content:

State Regulations
§ 712-2.1 - Applicability
§ 712-2.2 - General standards
§ 712-2.3 - General hospital construction projects approved or completed between october 14, 1998 and december 31, 2010
§ 712-2.4 - General hospital construction projects approved or completed after january 1, 2011

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
